1.content:
The day has finally arrived. The day you and Rachael get married. You can't believe how lucky you are. She is beautiful, funny, and somehow in love with you.

You arrive early at the church and are pacing up and down the aisle nervously when your mobile phone rings. It's Rachael. That's strange, you were under the impression that you weren't meant to have contact with each other today until the ceremony.
1.title: The Big Day

choices: Say you shouldn't see her before the wedding.
11.content:
She wouldn't be calling it wasn't important.

"Hi Rachael." You answer the phone. "Is everything alright?"

"Yes." She says. "When I took our bags to the hotel I forgot something." She had insisted on being the one to take everything to the hotel room for tonight. "I don't have time now. Could you come and pick it up?"
11.title: Answer the phone.

111.content:
"Okay." you tell her, you were never that superstitious anyway. "I'll be there in a couple of minutes."

You are soon ringing the doorbell of Rachael's parent's house. The house is huge. Her family is very wealthy.

Rachael's mother answers the door. "Hello Andrew. Rachael is getting ready in her room."

"Thankyou." you make your way up the stairs.

You pass your sister, Jane, who is one of the bridesmaids. "What are you doing here?" she asks. "It's bad luck to see the bride before the wedding."

"I don't believe in that stuff." you say. "She needs me to take something to the hotel."

You find Rachael in her bedroom, the other two bridesmaids are helping her into her dress.

"Hello honey." She greets you, half dressed.

You kiss her and ask. "So what do I need to take to the hotel?"

"Nothing." she says. "I lied to get you here."

"Why?" you ask, confused.

You notice the bridesmaids smile knowingly.

"To get you dressed for the wedding." she says.

"I am dressed." you indicate your tuxedo.

"Not properly." Louise, the maid of honour, walks over to the wardrobe and pulls out a white puffy dress, much like the one your flowergirl will be wearing except large enough for an adult.

"You will look much cuter in that." Rachael says.

"Don't forget her diapers." Kate, the other bridesmaid says. Holding up a thick cloth diaper and large pair of white plastic panties. "You don't want your little girl having an accident on her big day."
111.title: Go to Rachael's house.

1112.content:
"If this is a joke." You say. "I don't get it."

"It's not a joke." Rachael says. "I want you to wear the diaper and the dress to our wedding."

"Why?" you ask.

"Because from today onward I plan to keep you as my little girl." She explains.

"Since we were kids we've liked treating boys like baby girls." Louise explains.

"Rachael's little brother Tommy was our usual playmate." Kate adds.

"That's why I'm going out with him." Louise informs you. "I couldn't give up our games of dressup."

"I'm not letting you do that to me." you say.

"If you refuse." she threatens. "Then I'm not going to marry you. I only want you as my little girl."
1112.title: Ask what's going on.

11121.content:
"Okay." you agree, as she knew you would.

"Good girl." Rachael praises you. "Come here and let Mommy change you out of those yucky boy's clothes."

You meekly approach her to the excited giggles of the other two women. She quickly undresses you. You are embarrassed, standing naked in front of her two friends but you can't help feeling a little turned on by it too.

"Annie's getting excited." Kate observes your erect penis.

"You'd better get her into a diaper before she has an accident." giggles Louise.

Rachael expertly folds the diaper on the bed. "Lay down."

You do as you are told and she brings the thick towling up firmly between your legs. Kate passes her a couple of safety pins which she uses to fasten you into the diaper.

Your still-erect penis strains against the tightly fastened diaper. Rachael notices and squeezes you through the thick padding. "That looks uncomfortable. Would you like me to hel pyou with that?" She rubs you through the diaper to illustrate what she means.
11121.title: Agree.

111211.content:
"Yes" you say, horniness overcoming your embarrassment.

"Ask politely." Rachael tells you.

"Yes please." you beg.

"Good girl." She reaches one hand down inside the waist of your diaper. While the other women watch, she takes hold of your penis and rubs it up and down.

It doesn't take long for you to cum, squirting into the towelling. You let out a small moan of pleasure as you do.

"You've been my baby 5 minutes and you already need your diaper changed." Rachael comments, unpinning your diaper. She pulls it open, revealing the sticky mess you've made. With baby-wipes she begins cleaning you.

With the horniness gone you suddenly realise how embarrassing this is. Three women have just watched you climax in a diaper and now your fiancé is changing you.

She replaces the dirty diaper with a clean one and fastens you into it. No longer hard, your penis fits much better this time. She then helps you stand up from the bed before holding out the plastic panties for you to step into. She slides them up your legs and over your padded bottom.

"Arms up." she directs you and pulls the dress on over your head.

The three women adjust it until they are satisfied with how it sits. "Adorable." they all agree.

"You are going to be such a nice playmate for my little Tammy." Louise says.

You begin to feel the need to use the toilet. You always do after you cum.

"I need to use the toilet." you tell Rachael.

"Silly little Annie." Kate says. "You aren't going to use the toilet any more."

"You mean I have to pee in this diaper?" you ask.

"And poop" Louise adds with a giggle.
111211.title: Say yes.

1112112.content:
You've already agreed to this, you're diapered and wearing a very childish dress. It's too late to back out now.

You squeeze your bladder but nothing happens.

"I can't do it." you complain. "I tried but it won't come out."

The women giggle at this.

"Just keep trying." Rachael says. "You just have to get used to using your diapers instead of the potty."

"We can give you something to make it easier." Louise says. "A muscle relaxant. You wouldn't be able to hold your pee if you tried."
1112112.title: Use the diaper.

choices: Demand that Rachel changes your diaper immediately.
Just stay quiet, and let them lead you to the car.

You assume that there is a catch with taking the muscle relaxant, so you close your eyes and try to imaging that are you standing in front of the urinal and as you squeeze your bladder again, it finally works and you wetting your diaper. At first the relief feels nice and you even feel a liitle proud that you didn't had to take the muscle relaxant, but as soon as you realize the absurdity of being proud of wetting your diaper on purpose, you blush depply.

Of course that is all that Rachel and her two friends need to tell that you wet your diaper and the three pat your head.

"Annie you are such a good little girl wetting your diaper for Mommy. And now it is time that we drive to the church." Rachel commends.

111211211.title: Demand that Rachel changes your diaper immediat...

choices: They put a dildo in the seat
1112112111.content:
"Wait, before we go aren't you going to change me?"

"Oh silly Annie," Rachel says "I was hoping you'd say that."

At this point the two "aunts" leave the room leaving just you and Rachel. She walks up to you and lightly pushes you down onto the bed at a sitting position. She puts her hand down on the damp crotch of your diaper under the dress.
"No, I was hoping you could wear this to the ceremony. Aunt Louise and Kate are going out to the car now to prepare your 'special seat'."
She sticks a pacifier in your mouth and pulls you back up and guides you out of the door. She brings you down the steps and out the front door where Kate and Louise were waiting for you. They were standing in front of the car door fiddling with what looked like a car door. When they see you coming they move to the side to show you what they modified it with.

So what did they do to the car seat?
1112112111.title: Not yet!

11121121112.content: Rachel bends you over, moving the tube up your dress and through the leg hole fo your saturated diaper, into the butt. You don't say much retribution with the pacifier. She pumps it up so the tube dose not slip out and tells you to sit down in the special booster seat. You do so, she then buckles you in and releases the latch for the enema. Rachel starts the car as the two aunts sit in the back with you, as you start to feel the enema go into you. Aunt Kate looks under your dress and says "aw did you go pee pee, good girl. Now all you need is to go poopy." Awhile rubbing the front of your wet diaper. Two minutes pass by before you finally arrive, your tummy is grumbling. The two aunts leave and Rachel unbuckles you, locks the latch and deflates the tube and pulls it out. "Hold on Annie" says Rachel.
11121121112.title: They hooked up an enema

11121122.content:
"Okay." you agree. "I'll use the muscle relaxant."

"Really?" Louise is surprised by how easily you are going along with this. "I have to force or bribe Tommy to take it."

"My little Annie has always been cooperative." Rachael says, hugging you. "Kate. Could you please make up a special bottle for her."

"No problem." Kate leaves the room.

Louise continues to help Rachael into her dress and Kate soon returns with a baby bottle.

Kate sits on the bed and pats her lap. "Lay down here and Auntie Kate will feed you."

You lay on the bed with your head in her lap and she holds the bottle to your lips. You accept the nipple and begin sucking. The liquid tastes strange. Maybe it's some sort of baby formula.

Before you even finish the bottle you feel the diaper begin to grow wet. You ignore it and keep drinking as the wetness spreads.

When the bottle is empty Kate asks. "Are you wet yet?"

You blush as you answer with a nod.

She smiles down at you before sliding your head off her lap onto the bed. "Don't worry. I'll change your diaper." She lifts your skirt and petticoats out of the way and takes a plastic mat out from under the bed and slides it under your bottom before pulling down the plastic panties. Next she unpins the diaper and pulls it open. The air feels cold on your wet privates. She pulls the soggy diaper away and cleans you with some baby wipes.

"If she's going to need so many changes maybe she should wear disposables today." Rachael suggests.

"Good idea." Kate leaves you for a moment and returns with a large disposable diaper. She unfolds it and slides it under your bottom. She tapes it onto you and declares. "All done." before pulling you into a sitting position.

"It looks like we're all ready." Rachael declares. "Let's go."

You stand up but your legs feel wobbly like they are too weak to hold up your weight. After a few awkward steps you fall onto your padded bottom causing the women to laugh.

"Sorry Annie." Rachael says. "I should have warned you. The muscle relaxants work on all of your muscles."

"You'll have to crawl." Louise says.

"I can't crawl in this dress" you complain. "It's too long."

"She's right." Kate says. "She'll need a shorter dress."

"Or a stroller." Louise suggest.

"What would yo prefer?" Rachael asks. "A shorter dress or a stroller?"
11121122.title: Take the muscle relaxant.

choices: You ask Rachel about the details about your new life as Annie.
You show Rachel that you trust her completely by accepting your new life w.o. Qu
You become cold feet and ask Rachel if you can try out being Annie first before

You don't like neither option, but going in the stroller seems to be at least a bit less humiliating than crawling in a shorter dress, that probably won't cover your large disposable diaper at all, so you so say "Please get me in a stroller. I like this lovely dress so much, I don't want to wear a shorter dress. And please I don't want to crawl all the way to the aisle, I don't want the dress to get dirty."

The women are visible surprised by your sudden acceptance of the situation but Kate and Louise quickly leave the room to get a stroller for you.

Once you and Rachel are alone in the room she says "I bet you are wondering where Auntie Kate and Auntie Louise are getting a stroller for you from. You see little Annie your Aunties and I have prepared everything you need for the foreseeable future, like a changing table, a crib and so on. And to be prepared for everything Kate also stored your new stroller in her car. And now that we are alone here you now have the last chance to ask what your life as my little Annie will entail for you in full details. If you don't ask then I take it as a sign that you trust me completely and therefor don't need to know."
111211222.title: Go in a stroller.

111212.content:
"No" you say, not wanting to make today even more embarrassing by cumming in a diaper while Rachael's friends watch and giggle.

"Suit yourself." Rachael says, helping you up from the bed. She has you step into the plastic panties and pulls them up over your padded bottom.

"Arms up." she directs you and pulls the dress on over your head.

The three women adjust it until they are satisfied with how it sits. "Adorable." they all agree.

"You are going to be such a nice playmate for my little Tammy." Louise says.

The girls return to helping Rachael into her dress.
111212.title: Say no.

choices: Refuse to go into the church
1112121.content:
You sit quietly on the bed as Rachael gets into her wedding dress.

"It looks like we're all ready." she finally declares. "Let's get Annie's shoes on and go."

Kate slides a pair of white little-girls' shoes onto your feet and fastens the buckles. Then the women lead you from the room.

"What the hell are you wearing?" Jane asks when you meet her in the living room.

"Um..." you say, staring at your cute shoes. "Rachael wanted me to wear this."

"He's my little girl now." Rachael declares.

"And this is what you want?" Jane asks you.

You nod, still not looking at her.

"Whatever makes you happy." she says. "Come on we've got to get to the church.

Rachael leads you by the hand out to the waiting limousine along with her bridesmaids. You spend the ride staring down at the skirt of your dress, feeling the thick padding underneath. Is this going to be your life from now on? Diapers and dresses?

You arrive at the church and reluctantly leave the privacy of the car.

"Okay Annie." Rachael says, releasing your hand. "You've got to go up an wait for me at the altar." She urges you on with a pat on your padded bottom.
1112121.title: Stay in the room.

choices: Promise that you won't look in the package.
112.content:
"Isn't it bad luck to see each other before the wedding." you remind her.

"You don't believe in that stuff do you?" she asks.

"Not really." you say. "But I don't want to take any chances."

"Fine." she says. "I'll give it to Louise." Louise is her maid of honour. "She'll be waiting out the front."

A few minutes later, you pull up in front of Rachael's parent's house. It is huge, they are a very wealthy family.

Standing at the door is Louise, holding a large package. She runs to the car and jumps into the passenger seat.

"I can take it by myself." you say.

"Rachael doesn't want you to look at this." she explains, patting the package.

"Why?" you ask.

"It's a surprise." she informs you. "I'll just come along to make sure you don't peek."
112.title: Say you shouldn't see her before the wedding.

choices: Look through the other bags for clues
1121.content:
"I promise I won't look." you say. "There's no need for you to come. I'm sure Rachael still needs your help getting ready."

"Okay." Louise says, reluctantly getting out of the car. She leaves the mysterious package on the passenger seat.

The hotel isn't far. You carry the package up to the room and place it with the suitcases Rachael brought over earlier.

You are about to leave when curiosity gets the better of you. You unwrap the package and are surprised to find a puffy white dress. It looks similar to one the flowergirl will be wearing today at the wedding. However this one is large enough for an adult.

Why would Rachael even own a dress like this and why would she need it tonight?
1121.title: Promise that you won't look in the package.

choices: Call Rachael and ask what she has planned.
Pack everything away and pretend you didn't see it.
11212.content:
If you ask Rachael then she will know that you looked in the package. Instead, you open the bags. In one, you find Rachael's clothes. There is nothing out of the ordinary. You then open the other, expecting to find your own clothes. Instead you find large disposable diapers, baby-wipes and baby-powder. There is also a an adult-sized footed-sleeper a pink t-shirt and a set of blue denim overalls with a baby cartoon character sewn onto the front. In a side-pocket you find a couple of large pacifiers and baby bottles.

The only explanation is that she plans to dress you up in this stuff. Why would she want to do that?
11212.title: Look through the other bags for clues

choices: Put on a diaper and the dress.

You call Rachael.

"Hello Andy." she says. "Did you take the package to the hotel room?"

"You promised Louise that you wouldn't look." She chastises you. "You've been a naughty little girl."

"Louise was meant to get you into your dress for the wedding but you had to insist on going to the hotel room by yourself.." She explains. "I had decided to keep this as a surprise for after the reception now but since you've already ruined it you can go ahead and put on the dress, and make sure you're diapered underneath."

"What makes you think I'd ever do that?" you ask.

"If you aren't wearing the dress and a diaper when I get to the church I won't marry you." she warns.

"What?" you ask. "Why?"

"I'll explain later." she says. "Oh. There are some shoes for you in the wardrobe." She hangs up.

Diapers are worn instead of underwear, not over underwear. You're sure Rachael will be disappointed if she discovers that you kept your underpants on.

You stand up and take a few steps. The thick padding against your bottom and between your legs feels strange. You feel ridiculous standing here in only a diaper but you're not eager to put on the dress.

You do finally pick up the dress and pull it on over your head. You look at your reflection in the mirrored doors of the wardrobe. You would laugh id you weren't already dreading the laughs of everyone who will see you like this.

You slide open the wardrobe door and find the promised shoes. They are, naturally little-girl style shoes. They are made from shiny white leather and are fastened with a simple buckle.

You struggle past your puffy skirt to put them on your feet and do up the buckles.

Now it's time to return to the church. You pause with your hand on the door-handle. Can you really go out of the room dressed like this?

Sarah, the flower girl is waiting here. "You have a dress like mine." She observes innocently. "Are you a flower girl too?"

She doesn't get a chance to wait for an answer because the music starts and Jane gives her a push to remind her that she has to go first.

Sarah skips up the aisle, happily tossing rose petals as she goes.

Louise follows her, then Jane.

Kate takes your hand. "Come on Annie." she pulls you toward the aisle. "Our turn."

Together you follow the other two bridemaids. The guests gasp as they see you and you hear a few stifled laughs. Your two of your groomsmen stare at you, wide-eyed. The third Thomas. offers you a look of pity. He is Rachael's younger brother and you guess that he has been the victim of similar, if less public, treatment at the hands of his sister and her friends.

It isn't far to the hotel. Louise follows you up to your room. She doesn't even let you carry the package for her.

Arms up." she pulls the dress on over your head and fusses with the skirts until she is satisfied they are sitting right. "Just adorable."

Louise slides open the wardrobe door where she find a pair of shoes, obviously left earlier by Rachael. They are, naturally little-girl style shoes and are made from shiny white leather. "Sit on the bed." she directs you and slides them onto your feet before fastening the buckles. "All done." she declares, helping you up and pulling you toward the door.

By the time you remember that leaving the room means other people will see you like this she has already led you into the, thankfully empty, hallway. Then you are in the lift.

The lift doors open into the lobby. People give you confused looks as Louise leads you out of the hotel and back to your car. You can only stare at the ground and dread the reaction when people who actually know you see you dressed like this.

You are thankful to reach the relative privacy of the car but you feel ridiculous driving dressed like a giant flower girl. You actually find that you have to remind yourself that you are an adult and are allowed to drive.

You pull next to the curb at Rachael's house to drop Louise off.

info.brief_description: On your wedding day you discover that your wife plans to keep you as a diapered sissy.
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please check this subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DiaperedRoleplay/

You are Andrew, a young man about to get married. What you don't know yet is that your Fiancée, Rachael, doesn't want a man in her life. She wants a diapered sissy.

If you are adding to this story please keep it in the style of a "choose your own adventure" type book. That is keep the point of view 2nd person (The main character of the story (Andrew) is refered to as "You" - the reader) and limit options to choices Andrew can make, not events outside his control. Eg "Which door will you open? 1) The red door 2) The green door" is good but "What do you find behind the red door? 1) An over-sized nursery 2) The Rachael's mother." is not.
